snippet: Chris Kelly scored on a long slap shot shortly into overtime for the only goal of the game in Boston’s victory at home over the Washington Capitals.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Boston Bruins defeat Washington Capitals, 1-0, in overtime, to win Game 1 of Eastern Conference first-round playoff series; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Kelly scored on a long slap shot shortly into overtime for the only goal of the game in Boston’s victory at home over the Washington Capitals.

headline.seo: Boston Bruins Open Defense of Cup Title With a Victory in Overtime
headline.main: Bruins Top Capitals in Overtime in Opener
headline.print_headline: Bruins Top Capitals In Overtime In Opener
